      • generateVertex

        public static Vertex generateVertex(java.lang.String vertexLine,
                    java.lang.String vertexClassName)
                             throws InvalidVertexLineException
        generate vertex object from vertexLine
        vertexLine is of the form sourceVertex-Vertex1:Weight1,Vertex2:Weight2
        Example : 1-2:10,3:15,4:12.
        Parameters:
        vertexLine - the vertex line
        vertexClassName - the vertex class name
        Returns:
        vertex
        Throws:
        InvalidVertexLineException - the invalid vertex line exception

      • getPartitionID

        public static int getPartitionID(long vertexId)
        for a given vertexId, partitionId is computed and returned, partitionId starts from 0.
        Parameters:
        vertexId - , input vertedId for which PatitionId is computed
        Returns:
        respective partition Id
